Key Match Events: West Indies posted a record-breaking total of 218/5 in 20 overs
Afghanistan fell short by 104 runs in their chase
Post-Match Reflections: Rovman Powell, the victorious skipper of West Indies, appreciated the hard work put in by the team and Nicholas Pooran's performance
Rashid Khan, the captain of Afghanistan, mentioned that it was hard to come back when West Indies scored 90 runs in the first six overs and took learnings from the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played in St. Lucia, one of the best batting surfaces in the tournament
Others: Nicholas Pooran was named the Player of the Match for his scintillating knock of 98
